EmailTemplate.description: This email template is used to notify Benefit Analyst whenever Medical Benefit Stage changes to 'â€œ03 Pending Correction Returned'
EmailTemplate.name: LG_EmailAlert_Template_BenefitAnalyst
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Pending Correction Has Been Returned
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hello, Please be advised that a Pending Correction you submitted has been returned by the Assigned Implementer on the Case- {!Medical_Benefit__c.Implementation_Case_Number__c}. The relevant Medical Benefits record - {!Medical_Benefit__c.Name} is now in stage "03 Pending Correction Returned". Please log into Salesforce to review the corrections and take the appropriate steps. Link to Medical Benefits record: {!Medical_Benefit__c.Link}
